thread.title: Monarchs grow as a team with win over 49ers
thread.title_full: Monarchs grow as a team with win over 49ers

title: Monarchs grow as a team with win over 49ers
text:
Monarchs grow as a team with win over 49ers ODU Head Coach, Bobby Wilder is proud of how his team showed resilience against Charlotte. Post to Facebook Monarchs grow as a team with win over 49ers ODU Head Coach, Bobby Wilder is proud of how his team showed resilience against Charlotte. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Monarchs grow as a team with win over 49ers Brian K Smith , 13News Now 12:30 a.m. EDT October 20, 2015 ODU gains confidence by winning over Charlotte (Photo: 13News Now) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE ODU head coach, Bobby Wilder talks about his team's improvement with a win over Charlotte. 13News Now 
Coming off a bye week and trying to end a 3 game losing streak, Old Dominion showed plenty maturity in its come from behind win over Charlotte. The Monarchs rallied with 15 4th quarter points in a 37-34 win over the 49ers. The win improved Old Dominion's record to 3-3 overall, 1-1 in Conference USA. Head Coach, Bobby Wilder talks about how proud he was of his team's ability to figure out a way to win. Read or Share this story: http://on.wvec.com/1RTkF2g TOP VIDEOS
